message: We are in the update process, instabilities may occur!

html:
Registration for the friendly is now open!

You have until FRIDAY 9 pm (UTC-3, BRT, Brasilia) to apply.

The rounds will take place on the WEEKEND. They will be registered on Friday when I will send another message telling you what time the rounds will take place (and remembering who forgot to participate in order to participate :P)
